member.name: D2D1_BORDER_MODE
member.summary: Specifies how the Crop effect handles the crop rectangle falling on fractional pixel coordinates.

member.name: D2D1_BORDER_MODE.D2D1_BORDER_MODE_SOFT
member.summary: If the crop rectangle falls on fractional pixel coordinates, the effect applies antialiasing which results in a soft edge.

member.name: D2D1_BORDER_MODE.D2D1_BORDER_MODE_HARD
member.summary: If the crop rectangle falls on fractional pixel coordinates, the effect clamps which results in a hard edge.
